alert.note: Alert for Dade (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 3:25AM EST until December 06 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia...Tennessee... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Hamilton and Dade Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Big Creek at GA 9 near Cumming affecting Forsyth County. Big Creek near Alpharetta affecting Forsyth and Fulton Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including Flintstone, New England...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Big Creek...including Cumming, Alpharetta, Roswell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Minor flooding expands along Sells Lane in Trenton...Mason Road near Rising Fawn...and Creek Road near New England. All these roads will be closed. Also minor flooding expands much further downstream as the creek crosses the Tennessee border into the Tiftonia area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 13 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM EST Tuesday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later this morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
